content.text:
# Tim Lenderking

,University of Washington
}}
Wendy Sherman at the U.S. Department of State in Washington, D.C., on June 14, 2021.]]
Timothy A. Lenderking is an American diplomat who served as the first United States special envoy for Yemen from 2021 to 2025. He is deputy assistant secretary of state for Iran, Iraq, and regional multilateral affairs in the Bureau of Near Eastern Affairs at the United States State Department.
